sentences.sContent: She hinted at the possibility of a treat of some sort.
sentences.sCn: 她暗示可以找找乐子什么的。

phrases.pCn: 领会别人的暗示；接受暗示

remMethod.val: 打(hit)在门(n)上有一些细微的迹象(hint)

trans.tranOther: to suggest something in an indirect way, but so that someone can guess your meaning

trans.tranCn: 暗示，示意；细微的迹象；建议
trans.tranOther: something that you say or do to suggest something to someone, without telling them directly
